name: rybbit
description: Rybbit is a self-hosted decentralized social platform using ActivityPub for federation. Users can follow, post, and interact with others across instances.
features: Federated social network: Connect with users across different instances using ActivityPub.
Post creation: Share text, images, and links with followers.
Following system: Follow users on your instance or other federated servers.
Timeline feeds: View posts from followed users in chronological order.
Interactions: Like, reply to, and share posts from across the fediverse.
Privacy controls: Choose who can see your posts with public, followers-only, or direct options.
Hashtag support: Discover and organize content using hashtags.
Media uploads: Share photos and videos with your posts.
User profiles: Customize your profile with bio, avatar, and header images.
Moderation tools: Block or mute users and filter content you don't want to see.
Mobile responsive: Access your social network from any device with adaptive design.
Self-hosted control: Own your data and identity without relying on corporate platforms.
